班拿貝朝聖指南


機票
因航會有直航機，飛大概15個鐘，我好似未見過fanfares有做過馬德里既優惠 (復活節買因航機票六千幾直飛馬德里)
中東三寶，計埋轉機至少都要19個鐘，我上次搭emirates來回大概$4xxx，飛大概20個鐘

波飛
經官網買飛最平，比賽前一個定二個星期開始賣飛，不過有分優先次序，club member > madridista > public
班拿貝球場出面亦都有個官方櫃台可以俾你買飛，都係比賽前一個定二個星期開始賣飛，每日都會有飛分批出售
另外官方櫃台出面都有堆人坐係度會係咁問你係咪買飛
如果係官網買唔到，可以去viagogo, stubhub度買，佢地多數可以一早買定黎緊嗰季既飛，不過通常都係炒價 （我上次係用viagogo買，睇主場對西維爾，坐係同球員通道隔一個block最前排大概$3xxx，y絲睇馬德里打吡，坐兩邊上方，近3000元。）
*注意：賽事有可能會改期，提前好多買飛既巴打自己留意

Tour Bernabéu
可以參觀班拿貝球場、皇家馬德里博物館、球員休息室、領隊座位與球員後備席
門票: €25 (手持Madridista: €17)
開放時間：10:00-19:30 (星期一及星期六)、10:30-18:30 (星期日及假期)
*注意：比賽日開放時間會提早結束，有d地方唔會開放，巴打自己留意

Madridista
即場做madridista有優惠，平過上網申請
另外球場入面間Adidas madridista有95折，ultra boost嗰啲鞋都照樣有折

交通
去班拿貝球場好方便，metro直頭有個班拿貝站，班拿貝站係深藍色10號線，車站兩個出口都係一抬頭就見到球場
開波前一個鐘左右就入得場

以上資訊由duckyea!、潺仔、Y_nada_mas、🔥卻老提供

施丹讚戴亞斯：喜歡他的踢波方式

【Now Sports-體育】皇家馬德里於周四西甲作客0:0賽和基達菲，巴謙戴亞斯算是少數亮點之一，教練施丹賽後盛讚這名正選上陣的新星。

19歲的巴謙戴亞斯（Brahim Abdelkader Diaz）於今仗對基達菲時正選踢了71分鐘，雖然未能為皇家馬德里打開勝利之門，但已獲得主帥施丹的讚賞。「我很滿意，他表現很好，他喜歡冒險，我喜歡那些冒險的球員。他沒有畏懼，雙腳實力均衡，速度很快。」

今季巴謙戴亞斯由曼城轉會皇馬後，只代表後者上陣過7次，但施丹坦言會考慮下季留用他。「到時候我們會再看，包括馬高斯洛蘭迪和其他人等。我喜歡他的踢波方式，就是這樣。球季結束後我們再看看發生甚麼事，但重要的是今天發生了甚麼事。」

另外，施丹又讚揚對手基達菲的表現，指他們值得排在西甲前4並出戰下季歐聯。

圖片來源 : ©AFP

Real Madrid: Mourinho "killed everyone", even Ronaldo


Emmanuel Adebayor has revealed the fury with which José Mourinho treated everyone at Real Madrid, including Cristiano Ronaldo.

Former Real Madrid striker Emmanuel Adebayor has claimed that José Mourinho "killed everyone" in the LaLiga giants' changing room, including Cristiano Ronaldo.

The Togo international spent the second half of the 2010-11 season on loan at the Santiago Bernabéu when Mourinho was in charge of the club.

"At Real, we were winning 3-0 at half-time. [Mourinho] came into the dressing room and went mental," he recalled to Sportsmail.

"He kicked the fridge, kicked the television, threw water. He killed everyone. I remember he once killed Ronaldo after he scored a hat-trick.

"He said, 'Everyone says you are the best in the world and you are playing badly. Show me you are the best'. Cristiano took it. Ronaldo could score a hat-trick but talk about the one he missed."

Marco Asensio's agent has been doing some talking about his client and whether his future lies at Real Madrid or elsewhere.

Asensio has been linked with the majority of England's top clubs, as well as Juventus, and his agent says Real have rejected some humongous bids for the 23-year-old.

"Over the last year there have been offers as high as €150m and €180m, but Madrid did not want to listen to them," Horacio Gaggioli told ESPN.

"There is always interest in Marco from other big clubs, seeing if he wanted to leave, which is normal for the player he is.

"But he always says that he is very happy with Madrid, is only interested in being a success there. He is still a young kid, improving all the time, and the club is very happy with him too."

皇馬悶和基達菲 施丹憤怒了

今季表現叫人失望的皇家馬德里今晨在西甲作客基達菲時，僅能與對方互交白卷。主帥施丹賽後直言對結果不收貨，更指球隊亦因而憤怒。

對於今仗未能攻破對方大門，施丹直認自己憤怒了：「我們有足夠機會，就是未能入球。對於賽果我們有點不滿，應該要贏波才對。球員表現不錯，防守做得穩妥，就是欠一個入球，對於這樣的結果我們確有點憤怒。」

皇馬今季三大皆空，聯賽上要追上次席的馬德里體育會非易事，故今季很可能成為「三哥」。「Goal.com)

皇馬注意！尼馬最想同夏神合作

【Now Sports-體育】貴為全世界最高轉會費球星，尼馬最想合作的是誰？

尼馬（Neymar）說：「夏薩特。他是與眾不同的球員，跟我的風格相似。」盛傳兩人皆是皇家馬德里的目標，似乎尼馬的夢想有機會在西甲實現。

因為受傷，尼馬缺陣了差不多整個下半季，上場才復出；他在休養時到里約熱內盧嘉年華狂歡，被外界猛烈批評。尼馬回應說：「這是誇大的報道。我那時已經可以走路，亦操練了2個月。最令我受傷害的是看到有些前輩批判我，他們也曾是球員，而且做過比我更差的事。」

尼馬在2017年以2.22億歐元從巴塞隆拿加盟巴黎聖日耳門，重提這宗轉會，他自言是為了尋找新挑戰：「巴塞是我愛的球會，今天也是。我仍然會跟前隊友聯絡，但我當時認為自己需要找一些不一樣的事情。」

輪到法蘭斯哥利兒子向施丹求教

【Now Sports-體育】烏拉圭一代名將法蘭斯哥利被公認為好波之人，亦是球王施丹的偶像，不過這次輪到其兒子向施丹求教踢波心得。

法蘭斯哥利（Enzo Francescoli）球員時代的高峰期在阿根廷班霸河床度過，他曾兩度效力，總共上陣233次，射入135球，為球隊史上最出色的球員之一。他亦為國家隊上陣73次，射入17球。這名烏拉圭名將近日接受訪問時表示：「我一向不喜歡談論自己，但我與Marco（他的兒子）近日到日內瓦出席UNICEF的活動時，他看到一直的偶像施丹。」

「我們在同一間餐廳裡一起晚餐，我向Marco說：『你向施丹請教一下吧！』他向施丹請教了一些心口控球的技巧，然後施丹對他說：『問你父親吧，我都是向他學習的』。」

眾所周知，施丹在球員時期一直視法蘭斯哥利為其偶像，更因此將兒子的名字改為Enzo，與偶像相同。

【西甲預告】皇馬缺賓施馬衝擊最弱防線

【Now Sports-體育】皇家馬德里在周日西甲出征華歷簡奴，在賓施馬缺陣下，力爭撕破聯賽最弱防線。
撰文：歪花

皇家馬德里在周中忘帶射門鞋，作客悶和0:0基達菲，火力欠奉。他們今場面對更嚴峻的進攻問題，就是包辦球隊近8個入球的射手賓施馬因傷缺陣，而前鋒雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞亦未能及時復出。

皇馬今季在西甲34場轟入59球，當中有21球來自賓施馬，比重超過35%，十分重要。再者，翼鋒加里夫巴利、盧卡斯華斯基斯皆停賽，相信馬里安奴戴亞斯會在今季聯賽首度擔正，但這名射手剛傷癒，狀態平平，亦未必適應施丹的戰術。

華歷簡奴仍然有一線生機護級成功，不過剛吞了西維爾5蛋，於34場失達62球，屬於今季西甲防守最差的球隊。面對這條超脆弱的防線，若皇馬仍然交白卷，相信施丹會非常頭痕。

Real Madrid: Zidane talks to Vinicius to explain absence

AS understands that Zinedine Zidane this week sat down with Vinicius to explain his reasons for delaying the 18-year-old Brazilian's return.

Real Madrid boss in no mood to rush Vinicius back

On each occasion, Vinicius' absence has been purely down to Zinedine Zidane's personal inclination to hold fire on the Brazilian's return, and AS has learned that the Madrid coach has this week sat down with the forward to explain his reasoning.

Zidane has made it plain to Vinicius that he doesn't want to take any risks, and will bring him back into the fold when he is satisfied that he has shaken off any lingering effects of the ankle injury he suffered against Ajax in early March. Furthermore, the Frenchman would rather he made his comeback in the more favourable circumstances of a game at their Bernabéu home stadium.

夏神上「馬」逼走巴利？施丹：廢話！

【Now Sports-體育】盛傳皇家馬德里積極在今夏羅致夏薩特，以取代加里夫巴利，但教練施丹表示一山可以藏兩虎。

加里夫巴利離開皇家馬德里的傳聞無日無之，有傳夏薩特從車路士來投後，將直接頂替他的位置。施丹（Zinedine Zidane）說：「廢話。所有好球員都可以共存。當年也有人這樣說我跟佐卡夫，這是廢話。」

除了夏神之外，有指皇馬另一個增兵目標是曼聯中場保羅普巴，施丹卻自言在轉會上沒有任何決定權：「我沒有權力，最重要是大家團結。會長及管理層很重要，之後是教練，即是我。」

皇馬在周日西甲將作客華歷簡奴，施丹證實包辦球隊近8個入球的射手賓施馬受傷，今戰將會缺陣，剛傷癒的小將前鋒雲尼斯奧斯祖利亞亦未能復出。

【特稿】數據完勝高圖爾斯 施丹：我揀拿華斯

【Now Sports-體育】施丹回歸皇家馬德里後，基羅拿華斯搶回正選位置，他的表現亦沒有令球迷失望，亦獲施丹認同。

翻查數據，自基羅拿華斯（Keylor Navas）從泰拔高圖爾斯中搶回正選位置後，上陣9場只失6球，每場失球率為0.66球，比馬德里體育會門神奧比歷的0.68球更低。與高圖爾斯對比下，拿華斯在各項數據都遠勝隊友。比利時一號門將替皇馬上陣的24場中，共失30球，場均失球高達1.25球。此外，在拿華斯正選上陣中，皇馬的得勝率達66%，比高圖爾斯的54%為佳。

森莫亞（Zamora title）獎項，每年都會頒予每季場均失球率最低的門將。不過主辦單位同時要求每位參賽門將能在聯賽上陣至少28場，場均上陣60分鐘。換言之，雖然拿華斯在數據上領先，但由於他今季只曾在聯賽中上陣9次，最後亦不會多於28場，將無緣贏得獎項。

雖然沒法染指獎項，但對拿華斯而言，施丹的肯定，比獎項重要百倍：「我選擇基羅，因為我是教練。對華歷簡奴，且看會發生甚麼事。」

replies.msg: 師兄識波

施丹憤怒了：全隊都要道歉

【Now Sports-體育】皇家馬德里周日受挫於利雲特，主帥施丹直言為球隊的演出感到憤怒，承認全隊上下都要道歉。

「今天，我們甚麼也沒做。打從第1分鐘直到完場，任何方面都沒做好。有時你可能取得入球，但今天我們甚至沒有製造機會，沒有好好作賽。」施丹在球隊周日以0:1不敵華歷簡奴後，罕有地滿腹牢騷。

他續說：「我們實在該非常憤怒，我憤怒，因為我們今天展示的形象是糟透的，我也要為此而負責，不止是球員，但大家都要為己隊今天的表現道歉，全部都要。」

被問到是否寧願球季在此完結時，施丹謂：「是的，但我們還要去踢這3場比賽，作出不同的事情，決不能這樣結束；我們必須尊重足球及這球會所代表的。」

夏神：我要每季踢歐聯

【Now Sports-體育】周日英超，車路士作客逼和曼聯1:1，中場夏薩特若有所指：「我要每季踢歐聯。」

雖然車路士失掉兩分，惟阿仙奴拒絕「收禮」敗北，令藍戰士賽後仍以兩分優勢排名第4位，落後熱刺僅兩分，甚至有機會成為聯賽季軍。「車路士是全球最強的球會之一，必須每年出戰歐聯，我也要每季踢歐聯，我相信我們做得到。」夏薩特（Eden Hazard）屢傳夏天落「車」，此話相信會再被另一番解讀。

「己隊表現可以更好，帶強大的求勝心作客，和波的結果不壞，但絕對有能力再入1球，全取3分，現時剩下兩場，只要全勝便可鎖定前4。」

今年28歲的夏神補充道：「事實上，己隊初段比較慢熱，但之後已作出回應，下半場，忘了曼聯有沒有入球機會，但作客曼聯永遠是困難的比賽。」

Zidane: No Real Madrid improvement under Frenchman

Santiago Solari left Real Madrid nearer the top of LaLiga than they are now. When he returned, Zinedine Zidane was all optimism - but now...

Zinedine Zidane's return to Real Madrid brought a much-needed injection of optimism to a club which, after seeing their silverware hopes go up in smoke on three separate fronts, were royally down in the dumps: in just seven days in late February and early March, Los Blancos had been knocked out of the Copa del Rey by Barcelona, had crashed out of the Champions League in stunning fashion, losing 4-1 at home to Ajax, and had had an inconsistent LaLiga campaign knocked on the head once and for all - also by Barça.

When, in the wake of Santiago Solari's sacking, Zidane's surprise re-appointment was announced, Madrid were 12 points adrift of leaders Barça and five off Atlético Madrid, and had, realistically at least, been left to fight it out with Los Rojiblancos for a second-placed finish. Even that is all but impossible now, though. With three games to go in a league championship wrapped up by Barça at the weekend, Atlético have extended their lead over their neighbours to nine - exactly the number of points still left to play for (although Madrid do at least have the head-to-head advantage).

MAD FOR EDEN Real Madrid begin ‘phase three’ of Eden Hazard transfer as Sergio Ramos follows Chelsea star on Instagram in tried and tested method

The Blues forward has previously stated that it is his dream to play for Los Blancos one day

EDEN HAZARD'S potential move to Real Madrid in the summer could be edging closer with the Spanish side beginning 'phase three' of their pursuit.

The Chelsea winger is tied down at Stamford Bridge until the end of next season, but he has been heavily linked with a switch to link up with Los Blancos.

Hazard, 28, admitted last year that it is his "dream" to don the famous white jersey at the Bernabeu - especially under Zinedine Zidane.

Both Real and Barcelona are known for the seven steps they take in order to secure their number one targets.

Step one is identifying the target, with Madrid known to be long-term admirers of the Belgian international, while they are also looking to finally replace Cristiano Ronaldo.

The second phase is having a club legend talk up the potential transfer, with Hazard's idol Zidane recently claiming that he would flourish alongside Gareth Bale.

While the third step is a current player or countryman or former team-mate talking in his ear to persuade them to move.

Ex-Blues goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois told Hazard last month to join him in Spain, and now Sergio Ramos looks to try and coax the Lille icon into a move.

Ramos has started following Hazard on Instagram, as one fan quipped on Twitter: "Real Madrid getting their tactics in early then."

Chelsea fans remain convinced that Hazard will stay in West London for at least another season following comments he made after the 1-1 draw against Manchester United.

While Maurizio Sarri is unsure of Hazard's future, as he said: "I don’t know. You have to ask the club and the problem is the new contract.

"But I want to respect his decision. He will go in the last season of the contract next season, so I don’t know at the moment.

“But in this moment, for me it's not really so important. I'm really happy with Eden, because he's playing very well, he fights on the pitch, so I'm really happy with him.”

卡林保：普巴有銀河艦隊級數

【Now Sports-體育】不是所有人都認為曼聯中場保羅普巴好波，但前皇家馬德里中場卡林保就肯定是這名法國國家隊後輩的粉絲。

曾為皇家馬德里兩度捧走歐聯，並助法國贏得世界盃的卡林保（Christian Karembeu），現時為奧林比亞高斯的體育總監，最近以西甲傳奇球星身份，飛到馬來西亞出席活動。

被問到保羅普巴有機會加盟皇馬，48歲的卡林保表示：「只有教練施丹才可以發言，但球隊的確需要補強。我認為普巴比我更強，當他希望表現的時候，是一名外星人，我可以說他是銀河艦隊的級數。」

皇馬今季表現低迷，肯定無冠落袋，卡林保坦言很難接受：「不過，這也可以理解，因為施丹及基斯坦奴朗拿度離開。皇馬是世界級球會，但1年內經歷數任主帥後，失去了穩定、表現、戰績。」

皇馬兵齊祝福卡斯拿斯

【Now Sports-體育】前門將卡斯拿斯周三心臟病發入院，一眾皇家馬德里球員於Twitter向前輩送上祝福。

曾經跟卡斯拿斯在皇家馬德里共事的翼鋒加里夫巴利（Gareth Bale），留言表示：「我的朋友卡斯拿斯，祝你早日康復。」同樣曾共事的中堅沙治奧拉莫斯未有說甚麼，但打了3個雙手合十的emojis，以祈求前隊友平安。

雖然沒有做過隊友，但泰拔高圖爾斯接替卡斯拿斯守護皇馬大門的工作，也表示：「堅強！」至於同為門將的比高域、卡利奧斯同樣向聖卡斯送上祝福，現效比錫達斯的卡利奧斯說：「對這新聞很震驚！卡斯拿斯，祝你早日康復。」

37歲的卡斯拿斯周三操練時心臟病發，被送到當地CUF醫院治療。他效力的波圖其後證實消息，指這名西班牙名將情況穩定，暫時沒有危險，但或將在餘下球季缺陣。

卡斯拿斯病床上報平安：好驚但無事

波圖門將卡斯拿斯昨日於訓練其間因心臟不適被即時送院治療，據報情況已經穩定的他事後即使在病床上也不忙向球迷報平安，指當時自己確十分驚慌，但目前並無大礙。

卡斯拿斯入院的消息傳出後，各界紛紛向這名西班牙傳奇門將送上祝福，而他本人即使仍未出院，也不忘向大眾報平安。卡斯拿斯於網上貼上自己在病床上的照片，並寫道：「目前所有事情都在控制範圍內。當時我也十分驚慌，但現在我完好無缺。多謝大家的祝福及關心。」

而波圖主席Jorge Nuno Pinto da Costa則發聲明指卡斯拿斯將會休息一段時間，「幸運地卡斯拿斯今日遇到的心臟問題並沒往最差勁的方向子子發展，但無論如何他將需要住院及休息一段時間。」（Goal.com）

Salah seeks Champions League redemption

Ahead of Liverpool's semi-final first leg at the Camp Nou against Barcelona, Mohamed Salah explains why he has extra motivation after last year's final defeat to Real Madrid.

"When I think about it, it was very, very bad," he told Bleacher Report.

"Final of the Champions League, big dream for yourself and the city, for the fans, for everyone. We wanted to win the Champions League. That time was mentally very, very bad.

"Especially when I got substituted; I went to the dressing room and was just crying - I felt the Champions League was over and the World Cup was over. It was very tough for me in that moment.

"I think it still hurts until now because you didn't win it, you feel like you were close to winning the Champions League and you didn't win it.

"I wanted to play the World Cup, it's a dream, but I'm not fit. I got to my room, I was almost crying every day.

"Before the first game [against Uruguay] I didn't play, I was crying on the bus, I was crying in the bathroom because I wanted to start, I wanted to play.

"In the meantime, I know I'm not fit at all to play. In one moment it disappeared, it's so difficult."

佩雷斯：「新的聖地牙哥班拿貝將會是全世界最好的球場。」

今季季初的時候，皇馬宣布以接近六億歐羅，將皇馬主場聖地牙哥班拿貝球場翻身。並在四月初的時間發放更多圖片以供參考。


皇馬主席佩雷斯道出這是一個十分前衛和具世界性指標的球場。這項計劃不只是為皇馬重塑一個世界最佳球場，並會成為馬德里心臟地帶的地標。


這球場會是二十一世紀的指標，新潮、前衛、舒適、安全，配合上最新科技，球迷們可以親自感受到這球場的獨特性。對球會來說，這會是既新又重要的收入來源。


新的班拿貝球場不只是球會的進步，還改善了球場周遭的範圍，這能讓球會在面對國際足球環境日益困難的情況下，保持應有的競爭力。

Given that the entire footballing world is aware of Real Madrid's need to overhaul their squad, they have been offered all kinds of players in recent weeks and one of them was Dusan Tadic.

The fact his wages wouldn't be as high as other candidates and the fact he'd only cost around 15 million euros made him an interesting option, however Real Madrid didn't want him.

Their plan is to strengthen the attack by signing a player who can be compatible with Karim Benzema and who is also young.

Luka Jovic ticks both those boxes and remains the number one target.

C朗：皇馬球迷想我回歸

【Now Sports-體育】基斯坦奴朗拿度透露，仍有不少皇家馬德里對他念念不忘，在街上遇到他時紛紛會要求他返回馬德里上「馬」。

基斯坦奴朗拿度（Cristiano Ronaldo）今季雖已離開皇家馬德里轉投祖雲達斯，但C朗對皇馬和他們的支持者還是念念不忘：「西班牙人對我很好，不管有著甚麼問題，我也很想在他們的地方比賽，無論如何，這都是我不會忘記的事情。」

「我會繼續抬起頭闊步向前，我的人生是持開放態度的，馬德里的人很愛我，皇家馬德里球迷知道我為球會付出過很多，人們在街上要求我重返皇馬，他們會說：『這是你的家』，那是我真正樂於聽到的事情。」

儘管有球迷對其念念不忘，但C朗指出亦有球迷認為他高峰已過，期望看到他走下坡：「與此同時，人們也總是準備好作出批判，好像有人會想『他已完蛋，已33、34、35歲，應該退休』，但我很想令所有人驚訝。因為我的金錢，他們會視我為一個應該從來沒遇上問題，從來不會感到難過的人，人們認為有了錢，你就會過著跟現時不一樣的生活，他們正等待我射失12碼，在重要比賽中表現失色，那就是人生，我已作好心理準備。」
